original_text: So David and all the people who were with him went across the Jordan River. When dawn came, they had all gone across to the other side.
korean_text: 다윗이 일어나 모든 백성과 함께 요단을 건널새 새벽까지 한 사람도 요단을 건너지 못한 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: So David and all the people who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗과 그와 함께 있던 모든 백성이
